cast.name: 埃德蒙·希拉里 Edmund Hillary

this_title: Hillary & Tenzing: Climbing to the Roof of World
trans_title: 希拉里与丹增：登上世界屋脊
introduction: The true story of Tenzing Norgay, a sherpa from Nepal, and his quest to climb Mount Everest, which he could view from his backyard while growing up. He eventually becomes part of the British crew to climb Everest, where he meets Edmund Hillary, his eventual New Zealander partner who he makes history with by becoming the first two men to reach the top of Mount Everest in 1953.- Written by T.S. Hunter
chinese_title: 希拉里与丹增：登上世界屋脊
foreign_title: Hillary & Tenzing: Climbing to the Roof of World
